cast.name: 法比安·卡斯特罗 Fabián Castro

introduction: A fabulously delicious, totally erotic, forbidden love story, Wild Awakening is equal part drama and gay soap opera! Emma and Toni run a riding school where men are forever seemingly running around topless. Toni s life is mostly notable for his uncontrolled and promiscuous gay sex life- so when he falls for the foreman s gorgeous son Aaron, it causes shockwaves around the close-knit community, and for Aaron s homophobic father. Stacked full of the hottest latino men you ve ever laid eyes on, and dripping with sensuality, Wild Awakening is about as much fun as you can have with your clothes on!
